import React from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import style from '../Stlyes/Cart.module.scss' import { incrementQuantity, removeItem } from "../store/CartSlice"; export default function Cart() { const {cart}=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const dispatch = useDispatch() return ( <>

Shopping Cart

{cart.map((item)=> )}
# Product Price Quantity
#1
{item.title}
{item.price}$
 {" "}
dispatch(incrementQuantity())}> - +
dispatch(removeItem(item.id))} >
); }
